definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Women, for instance, make up only 13% of contributors.
sentences.chinese: 再比方说女性在参与者中，仅占了13%的比例。

sentences.english: Yeah that's right. I might be a metaphorical sock.
sentences.chinese: 对，就是这个意思我可能，比方说，就是一只袜子。

sentences.english: This room, for example, into zillions of tiny little elements.
sentences.chinese: 比方说我们可以把这间屋子，分成大量的小单元。

sentences.english: In remembering, names, for instance, a 13)rhyme association works wonders.
sentences.chinese: 对于记忆，比方说记名字，押韵联想的作用非凡。

sentences.english: In the nose, cilia help to drain mucus from the nasal cavity down to the throat.
sentences.chinese: 比方说鼻子，纤毛可以帮助粘液从鼻腔流到喉咙。

sentences.english: Let’s say you want to do a cash flow statement for the past year.
sentences.chinese: 比方说，你想建立去年的现金流量表。

sentences.english: For example, athletes cannot negotiate their [own] contracts," he said.
sentences.chinese: 比方说，运动员不能就他们的合同进行谈判。

sentences.english: Most likely you've worn many different hats during your career.
sentences.chinese: 比方说在你的职业生涯中有很多顶高帽子。

sentences.english: A circle, for example, is symmetrical under all rotations about the center of the circle.
sentences.chinese: 比方说，圆是中心对称的。

sentences.english: Missing authorization checks, for example, are the root cause of URL-guessing attacks.
sentences.chinese: 比方说缺少授权检查就是URL猜测攻击的根源。

sentences.english: Here, for instance, I wanted to have my girls taught the trade of paper-box makers.
sentences.chinese: 比方说，我原想让我的两个女儿去学糊纸盒子的手艺。

sentences.english: Don't just say that you want to lose weight, for instance.
In Standard Poodles , for example, size is getting out of control.
sentences.chinese: 比方说，在标准贵宾犬中，大小的问题已经趋于失控。

sentences.english: if you want to be a doctor, like Psychology major.
sentences.chinese: 例如说你想当医生，比方说专读心理学专业的。

sentences.english: For example, most of the Chinese people have black hair and eyes and yellow skins.
sentences.chinese: 比方说，大部分的中国人是黑头发黑眼睛还有黄皮肤。

sentences.english: For example, the number of elements in the list.
sentences.chinese: 比方说链表中的元素个数。
